title: Gospel Trumpet
verses: Hark, how the gos-pel trumpet sounds,Thro' all the world the ech-o bounds, And Jesus with redeeming
blood Is bringing sinners home to God, And guides them
safe-ly by his word To end-less day.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the proclamation of the gospel and Christ's redemptive work
